thread.section_title: UsedLighting.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of UsedLighting.com | www.usedlighting.com
thread.title: Glen Miller

author: Glen Miller
title: Glen Miller
text:
We purchased a used Lighting board for our high school.
We are very happy that we have a 'real' lighting board now and for a very good price.
We are located in Canada, it would be helpful in the future if you could indicate products that are shipping from Canada. This one was from Canada so it made the shipping very easy. Knowing ahead of time might make us more likely to buy if we know it does not have to go across the border and incur taxes
